Title: William
Plot: Doggett catches someone in the X-files office trying to steal documents pertaining to Mulder's sister. The intruder is a severely scarred man who blames his disfigurement on Government conspirators. He claims the source of that information - and, in fact, the one who helped him gain entry - is Mulder. Although he refuses to divulge the missing agent's whereabouts, the mystery man has enough knowledge of the X-files and its history to lead Doggett to suspect that he just might be Mulder himself.
GuestStars: Annie Abbott, Shannon Hile, Adam Nelson, Jason Waters, Dan Shor, Dallas Munroe, Kiersten Van Horne, Cyd Strittmatter, Chris Owens, David Fabrizio
